divs: sighting detailsupon driving to a new years eve party on 12\31\2012 i noticed a orange red fireball flying from the ne to the west. it wasn't going too fast but it was on a steady speed. i quickly grabbed the attention of my family to look up. i tried to pull over as fast i could because i wanted to witness this ufo but could not find a turn off lane. i then told my daughter to keep an eye on it from the back seat. she witnessed it flying west and disappeared into the horizon.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Estero
There were no other sightings in Estero on or around December 31st 2012
